original_title: The Legend of Magnus the Good
overview: MAGNUS, a fierce, young, Viking Prince travels in time and ends up in the middle of a drag show in present day Norway. The 11-year-old-boy is convinced the queens are Valkyries and enlists them to help him get back to his own time and kingdom. On route Magnus learns there is a better way to lead than through fear and tyranny.
title: The Legend of Magnus the Good
